definition.text: Each node features a menu. The button on the bottom-left expands and collapses the structure of nodes below the current node.

paragraphs.text: Go ahead and click the expand button!
The Tutorial node has several offspring, and these have several more offspring. That's why it's a hierarchy!
Structured visual representations of information are at the core of how Superalgos administers the complexity behind flexible and scalable trading operations.
